resources.string: "No Internet access detected, won't automatically reconnect."
Connected to device for Internet access
Sharing local Internet connection with device
Pairing grants access to your contacts and call history when connected.
"Couldn't pair with %1$s because of an incorrect PIN or passkey."
Speed at which the text is spoken
Affects the tone of the synthesised speech
Sets the language-specific voice for the spoken text
Play a short demonstration of speech synthesis
Install the voice data required for speech synthesis

This speech synthesis engine may be able to collect all the text that will be spoken, including personal data like passwords and credit card numbers. It comes from the %s engine. Enable the use of this speech synthesis engine?
This language requires a working network connection for text-to-speech output.
This is an example of speech synthesis
Reset the pitch at which the text is spoken to default.
Developer options are not available for this user
VPN settings are not available for this user
Tethering settings are not available for this user
Access Point Name settings are not available for this user
Debug mode when USB is connected
Show a button in the power menu for taking a bug report
Screen will never sleep while charging
Capture all Bluetooth HCI packets in a file
Allow the bootloader to be unlocked
WARNING: Device protection features will not work on this device while this setting is turned on.
Show options for wireless display certification
Increase Wi‑Fi logging level, show per SSID RSSI in Wi‑Fi Picker
When enabled, Wi‑Fi will be more aggressive in handing over the data connection to Mobile, when Wi‑Fi signal is low
Allow/Disallow Wi‑Fi Roam Scans based on the amount of data traffic present at the interface
Select Logger sizes per log buffer
When we are no longer monitoring with the persistent logger, we are required to erase the logger data resident on your device.
Store logger data persistently on device
Select log buffers to store persistently on device
Always keep mobile data active, even when Wi‑Fi is active (for fast network switching).
USB debugging is intended for development purposes only. Use it to copy data between your computer and your device, install apps on your device without notification and read log data.
"Revoke access to USB debugging from all computers you've previously authorised?"
These settings are intended for development use only. They can cause your device and the applications on it to break or misbehave.
Check apps installed via ADB/ADT for harmful behaviour.
Disables the Bluetooth absolute volume feature in case of volume issues with remote devices such as unacceptably loud volume or lack of control.
Enable terminal app that offers local shell access
Debugged application waits for debugger to attach before executing
Flash screen when apps do long operations on main thread
Screen overlay showing current touch data
Flash entire window surfaces when they update
Flash views inside windows when drawn with the GPU
Flash hardware layers green when they update
Always use GPU for screen compositing
Disable automatic routing to USB audio peripherals
Force screen layout direction to RTL for all locales
Force use of GPU for 2D drawing
Enable 4x MSAA in OpenGL ES 2.0 apps
Destroy every activity as soon as the user leaves it
Show App Not Responding dialogue for background apps
Makes any app eligible to be written to external storage, regardless of manifest values
Make all activities resizable for multi-window, regardless of manifest values.
Enable support for experimental freeform windows.
Tap to change or remove the password for desktop full backups
View and control currently running services
This choice is no longer valid. Try again.
"Convert data partition to file-based encryption. !!Warning!! This will delete all your data. This feature is alpha, and may not work correctly. Press 'Wipe and convert…' to continue."
This feature is experimental and may affect performance.
Enter password to perform factory reset in demo mode
When Privacy Guard is enabled, the app will not be able to access personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs.
When enabling Privacy Guard for a built-in app, the app will not be able to access or provide personal data. This may cause other apps to misbehave.
Enable by default for newly-installed apps
Manage which apps have access to your personal data

"In this screen you can choose which apps Privacy Guard should be active for by simply tapping on them. Selected apps will not be able to access your personal data such as contacts, messages or call logs. Long pressing an app's entry opens its app details screen.
Built-in apps are not shown by default but can be revealed by selecting the respective menu option."
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
"To add per app control, activate '%1$s' and press '+' on the menu bar"
Optimise your screen based on time of day and ambient conditions to improve readability and reduce eyestrain
Increase brightness and saturation automatically under bright sunlight
Adjust display for lowest power consumption without degradation
Improve colour vibrance of flesh tones, scenery, and other images
Deep red for preserving night vision
Warmer colours for less eye strain
Colours accurate to the sRGB colour space
Colours accurate to the DCI-P3 colour space
Adjust hue, saturation, intensity, and contrast
A half press will keep the screen on only while the button is held down
A longpress and release will launch camera
Seek music tracks by long pressing the volume keys while the display is off
End the current call by pressing the power button
Swap volume buttons when the screen is rotated
Answer incoming calls by pressing the volume buttons
Answer incoming calls by pressing the home button
Enable on-screen navigation bar and disable hardware buttons
Place the navigation bar on the left side of the screen in landscape mode
Display left and right cursor buttons while typing. Overrides IME switcher.
Bug reporting is disabled in development settings
Press power button twice for camera
Quickly open camera without unlocking your screen
Activate the torch by long pressing the power button while the display is off
Triggers which will activate this profile
"No Bluetooth devices paired. Tap to pair Bluetooth device before configuring triggers."
"No Wi‑Fi access points configured. Tap to connect Wi‑Fi before configuring triggers."
No triggers configured. Tap to add more.
Tap to setup a new NFC trigger.
Please select triggers which will activate this profile
Now configure what happens when the profile is activated
To configure and use system profiles, turn profiles on.
Writing a profile to a NFC tag allows for tapping the tag to select the profile. Tapping a second time will select the previously selected profile.
This NFC tag refers to an unknown profile. Attaching this NFC tag to an existing profile will allow for selecting the profile in the future.
Configure profile using current device settings?
Add or remove notification override app groups to this profile
Delete all user created profiles and app groups and restore them to default?
Enter a name for the new app group
This profile option is disabled by a device administrator policy
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Double-tap on the status bar to turn off the display
Display the number of pending notifications
Control which status bar icons are shown
Adjust brightness from the Quick Settings
Show toggle for adaptive brightness near the slider
Adjust brightness by sliding across the status bar
Control which status bar icons are shown
Manage which apps are hidden behind a secure lock
Help make LineageOS better by opting into anonymous statistics reporting

"Opting into LineageOS Statistics will allow non-personal data to be submitted to the developers of LineageOS to track unique installations across devices. The information submitted includes an unique identifier, which does not compromise your privacy or personal data. The data is submitted during each boot.
For an example of the data that is submitted, tap on Preview Data."
Allow installation metrics and device statistics to be collected
Install a weather provider to receive weather updates
Unable to launch the settings menu of this provider
Display the current temperature on the status bar
Adjust power saving features and device performance
The performance profile is currently unavailable
Restrict device performance and background activity to save power
Automatically enable power save mode at %s battery
Do not enable power save mode automatically
Automatically choose an appropriate performance profile for applications and usage patterns
Expand your available desktop space by hiding the status bar, navigation bar, or both
Turn the switch off to customise your expanded desktop on a per-app basis
Play a sound when connecting or disconnecting a power source
Perform various touchscreen gestures for quick actions
Vibrate when a touchscreen gesture is detected
Navigate to the previous music track
Skip to the next music track
